name: Kind Heart Survivors
storyline:
You and your three friends lost the biggest battle of your lives. But, it's (almost) okay, you have Dream, Enthusiasm, Luck, and of course, Sweetness. Oh, you also have a big problem: an almost shattered heart to fix.

It sounds like the synopsis of a Mexican soap opera, but this is just the beginning of a badass survival game that will keep you awake. You woke up on a weird and unknown planet and need to figure out how to survive and find a way to become the heroes you once were.

Come have fun with us and spend time with the best therapist of all time: a well-made game.
summary: In the game Kind Heart Survivors, you are challenged to survive on an unknown planet, build your base, and face unprecedented challenges. Are you ready for this survival adventure?
